com.p6spy.engine.spy.appender

Class Slf4JLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.p6spy.engine.spy.appender.FormattedLogger
      • com.p6spy.engine.spy.appender.Slf4JLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    P6Logger

    public class Slf4JLogger
extends FormattedLogger
    Appender which delegates to SLF4J. All log messages are logged at the INFO level using the "p6spy" category, except debug and error ones that log on the respective SLF4J categories.
